data.content: Third attempt after user feedback: fixed compadd display regression by building display rows as '<command><padding><description>' instead of description-only strings, and removed inherited "$@" args from compadd calls to avoid group option collisions. Group headers remain explicit cyan via -X prompt escapes on distinct -V groups (common-commands/other-commands). Local checks pass: cargo test completions::tests::zsh_ and zsh -n on generated script.
